sentences.en: A car is useless without gasolene.
A whole tankful of gasolene dropped away because of the tiny leak.
sentences.cn: 由于这个小小的漏洞,整整一油箱的汽油都漏光了.

sentences.en: Equiped with gasolene changeover gear and shuttle worktable ensure the stamping quality.
sentences.cn: 使用气油转换装置，梭动工作台带动工件平稳旋转烫印，烫印质量稳定。
